title: What could this be? Close to Helvetica, but still...
content:
Hi!

I´m doing titling for a film and really like this (please see image). I´ve tried with Helvetica, and it´s close. But still the original looks a tiny bit softer and friendlier. Any suggestions?

Thanks!  
best  
G

| --- | --- |
| [Skärmavbild 2014-01-10 kl. 23.30.27.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124132/http:/typophile.com/files/Sk%C3%A4rmavbild%202014-01-10%20kl.%2023.30.27.png) | 418.53 KB |
author: gabbbahey

comments.content: Mainly because of the /J, I'd probably go with [Folio](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124132/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/folio)...
